configuration.jdbc_url_params: <user_input> use a url here. Refer to https://jdbc.postgresql.org/documentation/use/

ssl_mode(Sample of disable or allow or p.mode: (disable or allow or prefer or require) There are two other options verify_ca and verify_full. You can choose either the four options here or the other two options

Payload-1.name: <user_input>
Payload-1.environment: Important:Ask user which environment to create the destination in. Give following options: Dev, QATesting or Prod

configuration.secret_access_key: <user_input> Mention if necessary for use case

configuration.Note(Only for LLM remove from finaly pay: You can only choose one type of ssl_mode per configuration. And there should be only one ssl_mode sample.
